events.event: Marcus discovers the abandoned house on Willow Street has strange glowing symbols and an unnaturally warm door
Marcus touches the magical chest and is transported through a portal to another world
Marcus encounters cloaked figures who call him 'the key' and speak of 'the Binding'
Marcus loses consciousness as the ritual begins
Marcus wakes in the Sanctum three days after the Binding ritual
Kira Shen explains the Binding, magic channels, and the Veil to Marcus
Marcus learns the portal home is permanently sealed
A Weaver shows Marcus a vision of the ancient war and the raising of the Veil
Marcus regains mobility and enters the Sanctum's main hall for the first time
Marcus meets approximately 20 other keys training in the Sanctum
Marcus confronts the Weavers and demands to understand the pattern
A Weaver shows Marcus a vision of the Pattern itself - the weave of reality
Marcus learns his mission: find and kill the tangle causing the Veil to break
Marcus practices channeling magic with Kira's resonance crystal and successfully manifests light
Marcus has dream vision of the tangle as a black thread corrupting the Pattern
Marcus attends first training session and passes the initial trial (8 of 20 keys succeeded)
Marcus befriends Dmitri and Lily
Mission briefing assigns all six keys to different corruption nodes
Marcus teaches other keys basic pattern reading and healing techniques in one afternoon
All six keys deploy through portals at sunset to their assigned missions
Marcus arrives at bridge between realities and sees two people fused together for 1000 years
Marcus approaches fused figures and reads their pattern using Evan's techniques
Marcus reads memory embedded in fusion: lovers separated by Veil, woman used violet crystal to force connection
Woman's consciousness wants death, man's wants salvation - conflicting requests
Marcus chooses shared consciousness protocol, enters the pattern directly
Marcus enters shared consciousness and experiences merged awareness of Lyara and Thomas
Marcus learns full backstory: 5 years of meetings through Veil, Lyara used forbidden fusion crystal
Marcus finds original binding thread at moment of fusion and severs it
Marcus uses his own pattern as buffer to guide the separation, prevents violent death
Lyara and Thomas successfully separated alive, Veil begins self-healing, Marcus collapses
